definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: It became the most successful bomber used in World War One.
sentences.chinese: 成了第一次世界大戰中戰功最卓著的一種轟炸機。

sentences.english: Joshua Bolten had a long and distinguished career in the Bush White House.
sentences.chinese: 約書亞在小布什執政期間，職業生涯成績卓著。

sentences.english: And the West lake of Hangzhou is an even more exemplifying model for gardens and parks.
sentences.chinese: 而杭州西湖則是園林和公園中猶爲卓著的典範。

sentences.english: The company has a good name for reliability.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司做事可靠，聲譽卓著。

sentences.english: The remaining protectionist barriers only detract from those huge successes.
sentences.chinese: 殘存的保護主義壁壘只會損害這些卓著成果。

sentences.english: Yet long-established western brands still have cachet in emerging markets.
sentences.chinese: 不過，歷史悠久的西方品牌在新興市場仍然聲望卓著。

sentences.english: The century - old shop has enjoyed a long-standing reputation.
sentences.chinese: 百年老店，服務優良，信譽卓著，歡迎光臨。

sentences.english: Now he is, at 38, the grand old man of the N.B.A.
sentences.chinese: 今年，他已經38歲了，成了一位功勳卓著的老兵。

sentences.english: In the recent years, Kingsoft has expanded into oversea markets.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，金山在國際化拓展方面成績卓著。

sentences.english: We are remarkably good at detergent and ink printing plasmagel with glass.
sentences.chinese: 在玻璃油墨印花膠漿和清洗劑方面表現卓著。

sentences.english: He has remarkable feats in motherland's unification, and was canonized as the Prince by Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 由於維護祖國統一的功勳卓著，被清王朝冊封爲郡王。

sentences.english: The university has an unrivalled reputation for its teaching and research in finance.
sentences.chinese: 該大學在金融方面的教育和研究聲譽卓著。

sentences.english: He was granted a special award of 1000 yuan for his outstanding work.
sentences.chinese: 他因工作成績卓著然而取得特別獎一千元。
產品遍佈全國各地，聲譽卓著。

sentences.english: Eurobonds would be a big sacrifice for the creditworthy nations of the euro area.
sentences.chinese: 歐元債券將影響歐元區信用卓著國家的發展。

sentences.english: Xu Wei is an outstanding master of flower-and-bird painting in late Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 徐渭是晚明聲名卓著的花鳥畫大家。

definition: to enjoy the confidence of the people/to be very popular
out of the ordinary/unusually (good, talented etc)
out of the ordinary/out of the common run
to be brave and good at fighting (idiom)
